```{r setup}
devtools::load_all()
library(ggplot2)
```

## Detasets
```{r}
catch <- load_data("../inst/extdata/catch.csv")
catch %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Catch)) +
  geom_line()
```

## Assessment & future projection
```{r}
assess_and_project(catch) %T>%
  write.csv("result.csv") %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Abundance, color = Type)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = Lower, ymax = Upper),
              color = FALSE, fill = hsv(0, 0, 0, 0.2)) +
  facet_grid(Variable ~ Method, scale = "free_y")
```
